# htmxr

<!-- badges: start -->
[![Lifecycle: experimental](https://img.shields.io/badge/lifecycle-experimental-orange.svg)](https://lifecycle.r-lib.org/articles/stages.html#experimental)
<!-- badges: end -->

> Build modern web applications in R — without writing JavaScript.

htmxr is a lightweight R framework that combines [htmx](https://htmx.org) 
for dynamic page updates with [plumber2](https://plumber2.posit.co) for 
non-blocking HTTP endpoints.

If you know Shiny, you'll feel at home. If you've hit Shiny's limits — 
routing, progressive loading, scalability — htmxr is your next step.
